description: Long Term overview with variables but no alerts

panels.description: max 90% Percentille  of each component memory usage
panels.title: SPP Server Catalog Space Used

targets.query: SELECT max("%idle") *-1 + 100 FROM "ssh_mpstat_cmd" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10m), "COMMAND"
SELECT max("%idle") *-1 + 100 FROM "ssh_mpstat_cmd" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10m), "COMMAND"

panels.title: VM Statistics

targets.query: SELECT mean("duration") FROM "sppmon_metrics" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(12h)
SELECT mean("duration") FROM "sppmon_metrics" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(12h)
SELECT mean("duration") FROM "sppmon_metrics" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(12h)
SELECT mean("duration") FROM "sppmon_metrics" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(12h)
SELECT mean("duration") FROM "sppmon_metrics" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(12h)
SELECT last("duration"), "version" FROM "rp_days_14"."sppmon_metrics" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY "version"
SELECT mean("duration") FROM "sppmon_metrics" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(12h)
SELECT non_negative_difference(difference("errorCount")) FROM "sppmon_metrics" WHERE ("all" = 'True') AND $timeFilter
SELECT mean("duration") FROM "sppmon_metrics" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(12h)
SELECT mean("duration") FROM "sppmon_metrics" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(12h)
SELECT mean("duration") FROM "sppmon_metrics" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(12h)
SELECT mean("memoryUtil") *100 FROM "cpuram" WHERE ("time" < 1596461046000) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)

panels.description:
Selected Processes monitored by top command
"java", "mongo", "beam.smp"

targets.query: SELECT sum(*) FROM (SELECT mean("%CPU") FROM "$rp"."processStats" WHERE ("ssh_type" = 'SERVER') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "COMMAND", "PID" fill(none)) GROUP BY  "COMMAND", time($interval) FILL(none)

panels.title: SPP-Server Processes CPU Usage (sshcmd: top)

targets.query: SELECT mean("%idle") *-1 + 100 FROM "server_mpstat" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host" fill(none)
SELECT mean("used")  / mean(total) FROM "ssh_free_cmd" WHERE ("name" = 'Mem') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "hostName", "ssh_type" fill(none)

SELECT sum(*) FROM (SELECT mean("%MEM") FROM "$rp"."processStats" WHERE ("ssh_type" = 'SERVER') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "COMMAND", "PID" fill(none)) GROUP BY  "COMMAND", time($interval) FILL(none)

panels.description:
Selected Processes monitored by top command
"java", "mongo", "beam.smp"

targets.query: SELECT sum(*) FROM (SELECT mean("MEM_ABS") FROM "$rp"."processStats" WHERE ("ssh_type" = 'SERVER') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "COMMAND", "PID" fill(none)) GROUP BY  "COMMAND", time($interval) FILL(none)

panels.title: SPP-Server Processes RAM Usage (sshcmd: top)

targets.query: SELECT "size_free" FROM "vsnap_pools" WHERE $timeFilter
SELECT "size_free" FROM "vsnap_pools" WHERE $timeFilter
SELECT "duration" FROM "jobs" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY "jobName"
SELECT mean("duration")  / 1000 FROM "jobs" WHERE ("jobName" = 'Maintenance') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d)
SELECT "duration" FROM "jobs" WHERE ("jobName" = 'Hypervisor Inventory') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "jobName"
SELECT "duration" FROM "jobs" WHERE ("jobName" = 'Hypervisor Inventory') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "jobName"
SELECT "duration" FROM "jobs" WHERE ("jobName" = 'Hypervisor Inventory') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "jobName"
SELECT "duration" FROM "jobs" WHERE ("jobName" = 'Hypervisor Inventory') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "jobName"
SELECT "duration" FROM "jobs" WHERE ("jobName" = 'Hypervisor Inventory') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "jobName"
SELECT "duration" FROM "jobs" WHERE ("jobName" = 'Hypervisor Inventory') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "jobName"
SELECT "vmCountBySLA" AS $tag_slaName FROM "slaStats" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY "slaName"
SELECT min("commited") FROM "vms" WHERE ("commited" != 0) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT "TotalVMDKs" - protectedVMDKs FROM "vmBackupSummary" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT sum("protectedVMDKs") / sum(TotalVMDKs) FROM "vmBackupSummary" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(24h) fill(none)
SELECT "TotalVMDKs" - protectedVMDKs FROM "vmBackupSummary" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)

panels.description: Selects mean of each unique storage, sums up to total per site

targets.query: SELECT sum(used_mean) FROM (SELECT mean("used") AS "used_mean" FROM "$rp"."storages" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "siteName", "storageId") GROUP BY  time($__interval), "siteName" fill(none)

panels.title: Site Storage Used (by capacity)

panels.description: Selects mean of each unique storage, sums up to total per site

targets.query: SELECT sum(used_mean) FROM (SELECT mean("used") AS "used_mean" FROM "$rp"."storages" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "siteName", "storageId") GROUP BY  time($__interval), "siteName" fill(none)

targets.query: SELECT mean("%idle") *-1+100 FROM "ssh_mpstat_cmd" WHERE ("ssh_type" = 'VADP') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "hostName", "host" fill(none)

SELECT count("state") FROM "rp_half_year"."vadps" WHERE ("state" =~ /ENABLED/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "siteName"

SELECT mean("duration_ms") FROM "influx_metrics" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(30m), "tableName"
